issue.title: [C#] FixedSizeList implementation is missing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17808](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17808). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Hi,

I'm working toward integrating apache arrow c# and I find out that FixedSizeList is not implemented. Is there a plan to implement the missing type ? Otherwise, what are my options to overcome this issue ?

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17644
